description: APPLICATION FOR PRIOR APPROVAL IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION WITH A DEPTH OF 4.5M, MAXIMUM HEIGHT OF 3.5M AND EAVES HEIGHT OF 3M.
decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: 

Due to the proposed eaves height of 3.3m exceeding 3m, the proposal would not accord with criteria A.1(i) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Reason : 2 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: 

In the absence of accurate dimensions confirming the eaves and maximum height of the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse, the proposal would not accord with criteria A.4(2)(a)(ii) and A.4(2)(a)(iii) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Reason : 3 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason:

In the absence of information relating to external finishes the application fails to demonstrate the external materials would be similar to the existing dwelling materials, as such the scheme would fail to comply with condition A.3(a) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
